integer boost::xint::core::montgomeryPowerMod (const integer &a, const integer &e, const integer &n)
 Returns the Montgomery equivalent of powmod(a, b, n). Used internally.

Detailed Description

Internally used functions.

This file contains the definitions for functions based on the Montgomery Reduction, used internally for an extra-fast xint::powmod.

Definition in file monty.cpp.
